description: Those who draw abilities from the gifts allowed to them by their deity, not enchantment. Their belief becomes their armor, their will the weapon that shields others and purifies corruption.

talents.name: Divinity
talents.description: Your conviction manifests as a radiant presence, empowering allies and scouring corruption.

ranks.1: You may channel conviction as an Action, releasing a wave of inner light in a 10-foot radius. Allies in range regain 1d6 Health Points; enemies of opposed alignment take 1d6 radiant or force damage.
ranks.2: Allies healed also gain +1 to their next saving throw. Enemies take 2d6 damage.
ranks.3: Channel conviction as a Bonus Action instead. Radius increases to 15 ft.
ranks.4: Allies regain 2d6 HP. You gain +1 to spell-like Divine abilities.
ranks.5: Enemies in radius must make a Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 round.
ranks.6: Once per short rest, channel conviction to remove one condition (charmed, frightened, poisoned) from each ally in radius.
ranks.7: Allies regain 3d6 HP. Radius increases to 20 ft.
ranks.8: Enemies of opposed alignment have disadvantage on attacks against you and allies in radius for 1 round.
ranks.9: Once per long rest, channel conviction to resurrect an ally who died within the last minute (they return at 1 HP).
ranks.10: Divine Presence: Allies in radius gain resistance to all damage for 1 round after you channel. You may channel conviction at will without Action cost once per round.

talents.name: Enlightened
talents.description: Faith sharpens your perception and resolve. You see the truth behind falsehoods and illusions.

ranks.1: Gain advantage on Insight and Perception checks against deceitful or disguised entities.
ranks.2: Automatically sense the presence of unnatural corruption or malice (such as charm or possession) within 15 feet.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, see through illusions and magical disguises for 1 minute. Gain +2 to Wisdom saving throws.

talents.name: Divine Burst
talents.description: In moments of peril, you release an explosive pulse of conviction, forcing enemies to falter.

ranks.1: Once per short rest, as an Action, emit a shockwave of force in a 10-foot radius. Enemies must make a Wisdom save or be pushed back 10 feet and take 1d6 + level radiant or force damage.
ranks.2: Damage increases to 2d6 + level. Enemies who fail are also knocked prone.
ranks.3: Radius increases to 15 ft. Allies in radius gain temporary HP equal to your Wisdom modifier.
ranks.4: Damage increases to 3d6 + level. Once per long rest, Divine Burst automatically affects all enemies within 20 ft with no save (half damage on save).

talents.name: Faith's Guard
talents.description: Your unshakable resolve deflects pain and fortifies those beside you.

ranks.1: When you or an ally within 10 feet takes damage, you may use your Reaction to reduce that damage by 1d6.
ranks.2: Once per short rest, you may intercept the attack entirely, taking the damage yourself instead.
ranks.3: Damage reduction increases to 2d6. When you intercept damage, gain temporary HP equal to your Wisdom modifier.

talents.name: Conviction Aura
talents.description: Your sheer will radiates outward, bolstering allies' hearts and burning away despair.

ranks.1: Allies within 20 feet gain +1 to saving throws.
ranks.2: Aura expands to 40 feet; allies also gain +1 to attack rolls while you are conscious.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, when you drop to 0 Health Points, all allies in your aura gain advantage on all rolls until the start of your next turn.

talents.name: Master of Divinity
talents.description: Your faith is unbreakable. You are the bastion of conviction in a world of doubt.

ranks.1: Gain permanent immunity to being Frightened, Charmed, or Diseased. Once per long rest, you can't be killed by a single blow: when an attack would reduce you to 0 LP, you instead drop to 1 LP and unleash a free Divine Burst as reaction. Once per long rest, channel your full divine presence for 1 minute: Allies within 30 feet regain 3d6 + Wis HP each round; Enemies of opposed morality take 2d6 radiant or force damage each round; You gain +3 Defense and advantage on all saving throws. This state ends early if you fall unconscious or choose to release it.
